en: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O Jehovah of hosts!
hmr: Aw sipaihai LALPA, I umnahai chu dit a va um de!

en: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of Jehovah; My heart and my flesh cry out unto the living God.
hmr: Ka hringna hin LALPA biekin inhuonna sûng tuollai chu a ngai êm êm a, anih, a chau pha hiel a. Ka lungril le ka taksa hi Pathien hring kuoma chun hlimin a khêk suok a.

en: Yea, the sparrow hath found her a house, And the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young, Even thine altars, O Jehovah of hosts, My King, and my God.
hmr: Anih, chawngzawngin in a hmuh a, Pelêuvin a ta dingin bu a hmu bawk a, a te siena dingin; Aw sipaihai LALPA, ka Lal le ka Pathien, Chu chu i mâichâmhai ngei chu a nih.

en: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house: They will be still praising thee. [Selah
hmr: I ina umhai chu an hamṭha a, Nang chu inpâk rawp an ti che.

en: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; In whose heart are the highways to Zion.
hmr: Nangmaa hrâtna nei mi chu a hamṭha, A lungrila Zion panna lamlienhai umna chu.

en: Passing through the valley of Weeping they make it a place of springs; Yea, the early rain covereth it with blessings.
hmr: Ṭapna ruom chu an hraw laiin tuihnâr umnahaiah an siem hlak a, Anih, ruotui tla hmasa chun malsâwmnain ân khum hlak.

en: They go from strength to strength; Every one of them appeareth before God in Zion.
hmr: Hrâtnaa inthawkin, hrât nâwk zuolnaah an fe hlak a, Ziona Pathien hmaa chun an inlang seng hlak.

en: O Jehovah God of hosts, hear my prayer; Give ear, O God of Jacob. [Selah
hmr: Aw LALPA, sipaihai Pathien, ka ṭawngṭaina hi mi lo ngaipêk la, Aw Jakob Pathien, na lo sit rawh.

en: Behold, O God our shield, And look upon the face of thine anointed.
hmr: Aw Pathien, kan phaw tak, en ta, I hrieknâl pa hmêl hi en ta.

en: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, Than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
hmr: I biekin inhuon sûng tuol- laia ni khat um hi ni sâng khat nêkin a ṭhalem sih a; Rîtloa puon inhaia um nêk chun, Ei Pathien ina kawtkhâr vêng- tu ni khawm ka nuom lem a nih.

en: For Jehovah God is a sun and a shield: Jehovah will give grace and glory; No good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.
hmr: LALPA Pathien chu nisa le phaw a ni sih a, LALPA chun lunginsietna le ropuina pêng a ta, Indiktaka umhai kuoma chun thil ṭha hrim hrim inro naw ni.

en: O Jehovah of hosts, Blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
hmr: Aw sipaihai LALPA, Nangma ring mi chu a hamṭha ie.
